message: Using the '.*' form of import should be avoided - javax.persistence.*.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'javax.persistence.*' import. Should be before 'org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.config.EnableJpaAuditing'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.time.LocalDateTime' import. Should be before 'org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.config.EnableJpaAuditing'.
Top-level class PostRepository has to reside in its own source file.
Top-level class Post has to reside in its own source file.
